edu.rit.pj2.vbl

Class DoubleArrayVbl

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.rit.pj2.Tuple
      • edu.rit.pj2.vbl.DoubleArrayVbl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Streamable, Vbl, java.lang.Cloneable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DoubleArrayVbl.Max, DoubleArrayVbl.Min, DoubleArrayVbl.Sum

    public class DoubleArrayVbl
extends Tuple
implements Vbl
    Class DoubleArrayVbl provides a double precision floating point array reduction variable shared by multiple threads executing a ParallelStatement. A DoubleArrayVbl is also a Tuple.

    Class DoubleArrayVbl supports the parallel reduction pattern. Each thread creates a thread-local copy of the shared variable by calling the threadLocal() method of class Loop or the threadLocal() method of class Section. Each thread performs operations on its own copy, without needing to synchronize with the other threads. At the end of the parallel statement, the thread-local copies are automatically reduced together, and the result is stored in the original shared variable. The reduction is performed by the shared variable's reduce() method.

    The following subclasses provide various predefined reduction operations. You can also define your own subclasses with customized reduction operations.

    • Sum — Class DoubleArrayVbl.Sum
    • Minimum — Class DoubleArrayVbl.Min
    • Maximum — Class DoubleArrayVbl.Max

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes

      static class  DoubleArrayVbl.Max
      Class DoubleArrayVbl.Max provides a double precision floating point array reduction variable, with maximum as the reduction operation.
      static class  DoubleArrayVbl.Min
      Class DoubleArrayVbl.Min provides a double precision floating point array reduction variable, with minimum as the reduction operation.
      static class  DoubleArrayVbl.Sum
      Class DoubleArrayVbl.Sum provides a double precision floating point array reduction variable, with addition as the reduction operation.

      • set

        public void set(Vbl vbl)

        Specified by:

      • reduce

        public void reduce(int i,
          double x)
        Reduce the given double into the given array element of this shared variable.

        The item field's element at index i and the argument x are combined together using this shared variable's reduction operation, and the result is stored in the item field's element at index i.

        The base class reduce() method throws an exception. The reduction operation must be defined in a subclass's reduce() method.

        Parameters:
        i - Array index.
        x - Double.

      • reduce

        public void reduce(double[] array)
        Reduce the given double array into this shared variable.

        For each array index in the item field, the item field's element at that index and the array's element at that index are combined together using this shared variable's reduction operation, and the result is stored in the item field's element at that index. If the array is longer than the item field, then the extra elements of the array are ignored. If the item field is longer than the array, then the extra elements of the item field are not updated.

        Parameters:
        array - Double array.

      • reduce

        public void reduce(Vbl vbl)
        Reduce the given shared variable into this shared variable. The two variables are combined together using this shared variable's reduction operation, and the result is stored in this shared variable.

        For each array index in the item field, this shared variable's item field's element at that index and the vbl's item field's element at that index are combined together using this shared variable's reduction operation, and the result is stored in this shared variable's item field's element at that index. If the vbl's item field is longer than this shared variable's item field, then the extra elements of the vbl's item field are ignored. If this shared variable's item field is longer than the vbl's item field, then the extra elements of this shared variable's item field are not updated.

        Specified by:
        reduce in interface Vbl
        Parameters:
        vbl - Shared variable.
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassCastException - (unchecked exception) Thrown if the class of vbl is not compatible with the class of this shared variable.
